basic.description: This course provides an applied introduction to the principles and practice of the engineering of software artifacts. Topics include: processes for managing software development, software architecture, software design, software quality management, software testing and human-factors of computing systems. The course is illustrated with case studies in industrial practice in software engineering. (0/0/0/34/8)~ COURSE DELETED IN 2009/10 ~
basic.subject: CMPE
basic.title: Intro To Software Engineering
